pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Geosoup v0.1.82Geosoup is a python package for geospatial data manipulation using `GDAL` and `GDAL bindings` in python.This package is a minimalistic software distribution for limited manipulation of common geospatial data types such as rasters, vectors and tables. All the heavy lifting is done by `GDAL`, `numpy` and, `scipy`. Install using:`pip install geosoup`Note: Must have `GDAL >= 2.1.3` up and running before installing this package.
